feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens, commas, and quotation marks consistently.

feature2.explanation: Similar use of vocabulary and grammatical structures observed in both texts.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have similar sentence structures and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Similar tone and narrative style present in both texts.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
